name: drag_battlebegins_01
pretty_criteria: As the game starts|Spawning in the loadout

name: drag_firstblood_01
text: First blood, heh heh heh he heh hah.
text_simple: first blood heh heh heh he heh hah

name: drag_attack_02
text: By the honor of the ancients.
text_simple: by the honor of the ancients

name: drag_attack_10
text: This will only hurt a lot.
text_simple: this will only hurt a lot

name: drag_ability_eldrag_05
text: The world shall end in fire.
text_simple: the world shall end in fire

name: drag_ability_eldrag_06
text: Face the knight, face the dragon.
text_simple: face the knight face the dragon

name: drag_kill_01
text: Live by the sword, die by the dragon.
text_simple: live by the sword die by the dragon

name: drag_kill_04
text: Welcome to the dead of night.
text_simple: welcome to the dead of night

name: drag_kill_05
text: Let my face be the last thing you see.
text_simple: let my face be the last thing you see

name: drag_kill_08
text: May the eldwyrms carry you to rest.
text_simple: may the eldwyrms carry you to rest

name: drag_kill_10
text: I've killed dragons less deserving of death.
text_simple: ive killed dragons less deserving of death

name: drag_kill_11
text: You fought and died with honor.
text_simple: you fought and died with honor

name: drag_kill_12
text: I sheathe Wyrmblade in the scabbard of your bowels.
text_simple: i sheathe wyrmblade in the scabbard of your bowels

name: drag_jakiro_01
text: Even as a part time dragon, I have bested you Jakiro.
text_simple: even as a part time dragon i have bested you jakiro

name: drag_lina_03
text: Lina, what know you of dragons?
text_simple: lina what know you of dragons

name: drag_lina_02
text: That's what you get, Lina, for enslaving dragons.
text_simple: thats what you get lina for enslaving dragons

name: drag_sven_01
text: Sven, you have much to learn about fighting dragons.
text_simple: sven you have much to learn about fighting dragons

name: drag_sven_02
text: Good night, Sven. I mean bad knight.
text_simple: good night sven i mean bad knight

name: drag_lasthit_01
text: I'll melt this down for armor.
text_simple: ill melt this down for armor

name: drag_lasthit_06
text: You'll need no gold where you go.
text_simple: youll need no gold where you go

name: drag_lasthit_07
text: Steel wins battles, gold wins wars.
text_simple: steel wins battles gold wins wars

name: drag_respawn_01
text: Ah, a chance to redeem my honor.
text_simple: ah a chance to redeem my honor

name: drag_respawn_02
text: My valor shall be proven this day.
text_simple: my valor shall be proven this day

name: drag_respawn_03
text: The shield of scale protects me.
text_simple: the shield of scale protects me

name: drag_respawn_04
text: The dragon rises from the ashes it has sown.
text_simple: the dragon rises from the ashes it has sown

name: drag_respawn_05
text: I draw Wyrmblade once more from its scabbard.
text_simple: i draw wyrmblade once more from its scabbard

name: drag_respawn_07
text: I'll not sheathe Wyrmblade 'til it's been blooded.
text_simple: ill not sheathe wyrmblade til its been blooded

name: drag_rare_01
text: Never make a deal with a dragon, unless you're prepared to keep your end of it.
text_simple: never make a deal with a dragon unless youre prepared to keep your end of it

name: drag_rare_02
text: The dragon Slyrak sleeps within this armor, and the knight within the Dragon waits. Beware you do not wake them both.
text_simple: the dragon slyrak sleeps within this armor and the knight within the dragon waits beware you do not wake them both

name: drag_rare_03
text: The wisdom of the Eldwurms, fused with the valor of the ageless knight: this is the source of my nobility.
text_simple: the wisdom of the eldwurms fused with the valor of the ageless knight this is the source of my nobility

name: drag_purch_01
text: Just what I've been waiting for.
text_simple: just what ive been waiting for

name: drag_purch_03
text: Worth all the gold in my lair.
text_simple: worth all the gold in my lair

name: drag_aegis_01
text: T'hah hah, hah hah hah, you're not done with me yet!
text_simple: thah hah hah hah hah youre not done with me yet

name: drag_deny_03
text: I can't let you have that.
text_simple: i cant let you have that

name: drag_deny_09
text: You wanted that? He he heh.
text_simple: you wanted that he he heh

name: drag_invis_02
text: What you can't see, will kill you.
text_simple: what you cant see will kill you

name: drag_inthebag_02
text: This my friends, is in the bag.
text_simple: this my friends is in the bag

name: drag_win_03
text: The dragon will not be denied!
text_simple: the dragon will not be denied
